General.Name: Holcim Argentina SA
General.Description: Holcim (Argentina) S.A. operates in the construction material industry in Argentina. The company engages in the production of cement, concrete, and stone aggregates. It also offers limes, hydraulic binders, and glues, as well as plasters. The company was founded in 1930 and is based in Córdoba, Argentina. Holcim (Argentina) S.A. is a subsidiary of Holcim Investments (Spain) SL.
General.Address: Capitalinas Complex, SuquAa Building, Córdoba, Argentina, 5000
